li.a: Grade Level Notes and Resource Recommendations
La intimidacin artculo y poltica del distrito escolar

div.div:
While we may not be able to see each other during the school closure, we'd still like to keep in touch. Over the course of time, we will be posting YouTube videos to let you know what we are doing. Here is the link to the current video:
https://youtu.be/vZpgZwYqJj8
